training.aiRecomindationMessage: This schedule generated using AI to help you with planning. Feel free to adjust it as needed, but please make sure to keep the start and end dates you selected.
training.defaultEmailInstructions:
Important: Please ensure you replace the following placeholders in all language versions of this email:
  • [Information Security] - Replace this with your department name or email address (e.g., security@company.com).
  • [support contact info] - Replace this with your support contact information (e.g., support@company.com).
If these placeholders are not replaced, the email will be sent with the placeholders as is, in every language version of the email.

messages.adUser: Manually add users by filling out their details, such as first name, last name, email, groups, and language preferences. This option allows direct user registration and active status management.
messages.excelUsers: Add users in bulk by importing an Excel file. This option streamlines the process of adding multiple users at once. Ensure your file is correctly formatted, with all the necessary user details, before uploading.
messages.excelUsersMessage: Please ensure that the Organization Units in the Excel file are already present in the system to avoid data mismatches. If the OUs dosn't exist,
messages.adSync: Automatically sync users from your Active Directory. This option keeps your system in sync with your organization's AD, making sure user information is up to date and consistent across both platforms.

user-tenant-profile.paymentMethodsMessage: Choose your preferred payment method from the options below. You can select Credit Card, PayPal, Wire Transfer, or Bitcoin. Your choice will determine how you will complete your payment.
user-tenant-profile.creditCardMessage: Pay securely using your Credit Card. Enjoy the convenience and safety of online payment with all major credit cards accepted.
user-tenant-profile.payPalMessage: Use PayPal for a quick and secure payment. Log in to your PayPal account to complete the transaction easily.
user-tenant-profile.wireTransferMessage: Choose Wire Transfer to make a direct bank transfer. Follow the instructions provided to complete your payment securely.
user-tenant-profile.bitCoinMessage: Pay with Bitcoin for a modern and innovative payment experience. Ensure you have a Bitcoin wallet set up for this method.
user-tenant-profile.pricingPlansMessage: Choose the perfect plan for your organization and start strengthening your security awareness. Whether you're a small team or a large enterprise, we have a solution tailored to meet your needs.
user-tenant-profile.yourRequestCompletedSuccessfullyMessage: You will receive an email within 48 hours once our accounting department completes their verification. Please check your inbox for further updates.

training-campaign-statistics.name: Name:
training-campaign-statistics.CampaignLeaderboardMessage: Welcome to the Campaigns Leaderboard! Here you can view user rankings across all campaigns or focus on a specific campaign. Track who's leading and see the first users to complete their lessons in each campaign. Compete to be at the top and motivate others to complete their training on time!
training-campaign-statistics.noData: No users have started yet. Points will be awarded once participation begins. The leaderboard will update as soon as users start participating.
training-campaign-statistics.numberofUserswhohavenotcompletedtheirass: Number of Users who have not completed their assignments

phishingCampaignsDashboard.trendAnalysisMessage: Welcome to the Phishing Campaign Trend Analysis. This chart provides an overview of users expected to report phishing attempts compared to those who have yet to take action. Monitoring these trends supports improved security awareness and fosters timely responses across all campaigns.
phishingCampaignsDashboard.campaignLeaderboardMessage: Phishing Campaign Leaderboard: Track users impacted by phishing attempts and their corresponding negative points. Foster improvement to minimize phishing incidents over time.

phishingCampaignsDashboard.name: Name

trainingCampaignsDashboard.trendAnalysisMessage: Training Campaign Trend Analysis: This chart tracks progress toward monthly targets, comparing users expected to complete their campaigns with those who have already finished. Stay focused to ensure timely completion for all users.
trainingCampaignsDashboard.campaignLeaderboardMessage: Campaigns Leaderboard: View user rankings across all campaigns or filter by a specific campaign. Track top performers and the first to complete their lessons, encouraging timely training completion and healthy competition.

messages.editCampaignMessage: You have selected the 'All Users' option for this campaign. As a result, the user list is automatically populated with all users in the system. Since the selection includes every user, you cannot make individual edits to the users in this campaign. If you wish to customize the user selection, please choose an alternative source, such as specific departments or groups.
